settings.text:
As we enter a new era of space exploration, science fiction is becoming reality. Advanced technology is transforming our capabilities beyond Earth's atmosphere.

The mission is clear: establish lunar bases and reach Mars. The current goal is to land a person on Mars by 2035, followed by the possibility of public space travel. Would you buy a ticket?
Beyond Earth: Humanity's Next Giant Leap could happen in the next 10 years
Projected value of the global space economy by 2030
The reduction in space launch costs over the past decade.
The number of Earth-like planets estimated to exist in our galaxy.
The average distance to Mars is a whopping 225 million km.

settings.notesContent:
Instructions

Spans / Overlap

You can control the spans of the heading and media elements with var(--media-span) and  var(--heading-span) on the the Content Grid Yankee element in custom CSS. The overlap is optional and can be removed by setting values that don't equal more than 11.

Heading line highlighting

You can't see the effect in the builder, but each line of the heading is wrapped in a span tag (automatically via JS snippet) and styled on the .content-grid-yankee__heading class in custom CSS which you're free to edit.

You can remove this effect altogether by disabling the JS snippet. If you don't see the effect at all, make sure the JS snippet is activated.
